title: Work with us on forests - Amazon communities
content: As a major deforestation pledge is signed in Glasgow, indigenous groups in the Amazon say they need to be directly involved.

title: World leaders promise to end deforestation by 2030
content: More than 100 nations - including Brazil, Russia and Indonesia - sign COP26's first major deal.

title: US to tackle methane leaks from oil and gas wells
content: The Biden administration plans to restore tough rules curbing one of the most potent greenhouse gases.

title: Race to find survivors in Nigeria building collapse
content: At least 10 people have died and many are feared trapped under rubble at the site in Lagos.

title: Bezos pledges $2bn for restoring nature
content: Amazon founder Jeff Bezos tells the COP26 climate meeting he was inspired by his recent space trip.

title: France delays sanctions as fishing talks continue
content: Paris has stepped back from a threat to block British fishing boats from its ports from midnight.

title: Johnson apology to minister over wheelchair access
content: UK prime minister says sorry for "confusion" to Israeli minister who was unable to get into COP26.

title: Cheeky parrot plays peekaboo with traffic camera
content: A turquoise-fronted amazon parrot was captured investigating a CCTV camera in Curitiba, Brazil.

title: Australian PM rejects 'slurs' from France amid row
content: Scott Morrison was accused by Emmanuel Macron of lying about plans to scrap a submarine deal.

title: Blasts and gunfire in Kabul as hospital is attacked
content: Unconfirmed reports suggest at least 15 have been killed in an attack at Sardar Dawood Khan hospital.

title: Nicaragua accused of running internet troll farm
content: Facebook parent firm Meta removes hundreds of fake accounts said to be part of a disinformation campaign.

title: Elon Musk says Tesla has not signed Hertz deal
content: Last week, Tesla's market value surged over $1 trillion after the rental car firm said it had ordered 100,000 cars.

title: Thunberg tells protest politicians are pretending
content: Thousands have travelled to the city for protests, one of which took place near to the venue where world leaders are meeting.

title: India promises net zero emissions by 2070
content: The pledge misses a key goal of the COP26 summit for all nations to commit to net zero by 2050.
